home.heroTitle: Create your next CV with the power of AI
home.heroSubtitle: Build a professional CV that stands out. Use our modern templates and AI assistant to craft the perfect resume in minutes.
home.featuresDescription: CV Spark AI provides all the tools you need to build a CV that opens doors.
home.featureModernTemplatesDescription: Choose from a selection of modern, professional, and minimalist templates to best represent you.
home.featureAiAssistantDescription: Generate a compelling professional profile with our AI assistant, tailored to your experience and goals.
home.featurePdfExportDescription: Easily download your finished CV as a high-quality PDF, ready to be shared with recruiters.
